title: In-person sessions
cleaned_text: - Pre-session information to be sent via Blackboard course announcements to class beforehand - There is no social distancing requirements for vaccinated students, faculty and staff. - Regardless of vaccination status, everyone should adhere to masking guidelines. - If NYC and the Health System are in the moderate risk for COVID category, lecturers are permitted to unmask as long as they remain six feet away from others. - We encourage students, faculty and staff to NOT congregate in hallways pre- and post- sessions
